sense.name: undergo evolutionary development
sense.examples: Did birds evolve from dinosaurs? Humans did not evolve from monkeys. Over time, they evolved into species whose legs held their bodies off the ground.

sense.name: develop, work out
sense.examples: Can Enterprise 2.0 evolve from Enterprise 1.0? How has he evolved as a businessman and as a public figure? The bill has evolved to a House-Senate compromise. She evolved a lot musically as she got older. Ten years ago we said we would evolve our programs and services.
